title: Autoimmune Drug Class Analysis
summary: DMARDs achieve 75.4% precision for autoimmune diseases. Biologics (anti-TNF, IL inhibitors) rarely appear due to training data sparsity.

root_cause.issue: Biologics have extremely low training frequency

production_recommendation: Add DMARD + rank<=10 as GOLDEN tier for autoimmune (75% precision). Biologics cannot be rescued - data sparsity is fundamental.
